snippet: Schools in the Renewal program showed gains on statewide tests in reading and math that were comparable to increases at other city schools....
abstract: New York City Education Dept report on statewide test results shows students at schools that are part of de Blasio administration's Renewal Schools program, which offers struggling schools social services and longer school day, are keeping pace with their peers at other city schools.
lead_paragraph: Schools in the Renewal program showed gains on statewide tests in reading and math that were comparable to increases at other city schools.

headline.main: Pupils at New York’s Most Troubled Schools Keep Pace With Peers
headline.print_headline: Pupils at Troubled Schools Keep Pace With Peers
